roundtrip I'm waiting you know 60 to 100 milliseconds for that that commit that
would be a bad experience so people don't do synchronous communication they do what's called asynchronous which is they send the data and then they move on
and hope that it gets there so the problem with that is that if there is an outage there's some data that will be
